properties.title: Cabane de Chanrion CAS
properties.description: Passionate mountaineers, high alpinists, mountain bikers and in winter ski mountaineers on the Haute Route meet in this cabin on the shores of Mauvoisin reservoir in Val de Bagnes. The landscape shaped by glaciers abounds in mountain lakes and the view of Grand Combin is awesome. Round trips, col crossings (to Italy as well) and numerous ascents are possible. The traditional stone building with a remarkable round annex is popular with families.
